kv1.5:1.3_0: Accantaṁ jahati, anavasesaṁ jahati, appaṭisandhiyaṁ jahati, samūlaṁ jahati, sataṇhaṁ jahati, sānusayaṁ jahati, ariyena ñāṇena jahati, ariyena maggena jahati, akuppaṁ paṭivijjhanto jahati, anāgāmiphalaṁ sacchikaronto jahatīti?
kv1.5:2.3_0: Accantaṁ vikkhambheti, anavasesaṁ vikkhambheti, appaṭisandhiyaṁ vikkhambheti, samūlaṁ vikkhambheti, sataṇhaṁ vikkhambheti, sānusayaṁ vikkhambheti, ariyena ñāṇena vikkhambheti, ariyena maggena vikkhambheti, akuppaṁ paṭivijjhanto vikkhambheti, anāgāmiphalaṁ sacchikaronto vikkhambhetīti?
kv1.5:3.1_0: Jahati anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo kāmarāgabyāpādaṁ, so ca accantaṁ jahati, anavasesaṁ jahati …pe…
kv1.5:3.4_0: Jahati puthujjano kāmarāgabyāpādaṁ, so ca accantaṁ jahati, anavasesaṁ jahati …pe…
kv1.5:4.1_0: Vikkhambheti anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo kāmarāgabyāpādaṁ, so ca accantaṁ vikkhambheti, anavasesaṁ vikkhambheti …pe…
kv1.5:4.4_0: Vikkhambheti puthujjano kāmarāgabyāpādaṁ, so ca accantaṁ vikkhambheti, anavasesaṁ vikkhambheti …pe…
kv1.5:5.1_0: Jahati puthujjano kāmarāgabyāpādaṁ, so ca na accantaṁ jahati, na anavasesaṁ jahati …pe…
kv1.5:5.4_0: Jahati anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo kāmarāgabyāpādaṁ, so ca na accantaṁ jahati …pe…
kv1.5:6.1_0: Vikkhambheti puthujjano kāmarāgabyāpādaṁ, so ca na accantaṁ vikkhambheti, na anavasesaṁ vikkhambheti …pe…
kv1.5:6.4_0: Vikkhambheti anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo kāmarāgabyāpādaṁ, so ca na accantaṁ vikkhambheti, na anavasesaṁ vikkhambheti …pe…
kv1.5:7.5_0: Rūpāvacaro maggo niyyāniko khayagāmī bodhagāmī apacayagāmī anāsavo asaṁyojaniyo aganthaniyo anoghaniyo ayoganiyo anīvaraṇiyo aparāmaṭṭho anupādāniyo asaṅkilesiyoti?
kv1.5:7.7_0: Nanu rūpāvacaro maggo aniyyāniko na khayagāmī na bodhagāmī na apacayagāmī sāsavo saṁyojaniyo …pe… saṅkilesiyoti?
kv1.5:7.9_0: Hañci rūpāvacaro maggo aniyyāniko na khayagāmī …pe…
kv1.5:7.10_0: saṅkilesiyo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.5:8.1_0: Jahati anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo anāgāmimaggena kāmarāgabyāpādaṁ, so ca maggo niyyāniko khayagāmī bodhagāmī apacayagāmī anāsavo …pe…
kv1.5:8.4_0: Jahati puthujjano rūpāvacarena maggena kāmarāgabyāpādaṁ, so ca maggo niyyāniko khayagāmī bodhagāmī apacayagāmī anāsavo …pe…
kv1.5:9.1_0: Jahati puthujjano rūpāvacarena maggena kāmarāgabyāpādaṁ, so ca maggo aniyyāniko na khayagāmī na bodhagāmī na apacayagāmī sāsavo …pe…
kv1.5:9.4_0: Jahati anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo anāgāmimaggena kāmarāgabyāpādaṁ, so ca maggo aniyyāniko na khayagāmī na bodhagāmī na apacayagāmī sāsavo …pe…
kv1.5:10.1_0: Puthujjano kāmesu vītarāgo saha dhammābhisamayā anāgāmiphale saṇṭhātīti?
kv1.5:11.1_0: Puthujjano kāmesu vītarāgo saha dhammābhisamayā anāgāmiphale saṇṭhātīti?
kv1.5:13.3_0: Tiṇṇaṁ phassānaṁ tissannaṁ vedanānaṁ tissannaṁ saññānaṁ tissannaṁ cetanānaṁ tiṇṇaṁ cittānaṁ tissannaṁ saddhānaṁ tiṇṇaṁ vīriyānaṁ tissannaṁ satīnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ samādhīnaṁ tissannaṁ paññānaṁ samodhānaṁ hotīti?
kv1.5:14.1_0: Puthujjano kāmesu vītarāgo saha dhammābhisamayā anāgāmiphale saṇṭhātīti?
kv1.5:16.3_0: Nanu tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ pahānā sotāpattiphalaṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatāti?
kv1.5:16.5_0: Hañci tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ pahānā sotāpattiphalaṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.5:16.7_0: Anāgāmimaggena oḷārikaṁ kāmarāgaṁ oḷārikaṁ byāpādaṁ jahatīti?
kv1.5:17.1_0: Anāgāmimaggena oḷārikaṁ kāmarāgaṁ oḷārikaṁ byāpādaṁ jahatīti?
kv1.5:17.3_0: Nanu kāmarāgabyāpādānaṁ tanubhāvā sakadāgāmiphalaṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatāti?
kv1.5:17.5_0: Hañci kāmarāgabyāpādānaṁ tanubhāvā sakadāgāmiphalaṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.5:18.1_0: Puthujjano kāmesu vītarāgo saha dhammābhisamayā anāgāmiphale saṇṭhātīti?
kv1.5:18.3_0: Ye keci dhammaṁ abhisamenti, sabbe te saha dhammābhisamayā anāgāmiphale saṇṭhahantīti?
kv1.5:24.4_0: “so hi nāma, bhikkhave, sunetto satthā evaṁ dīghāyuko samāno evaṁ ciraṭṭhitiko aparimutto ahosi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi aparimutto dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
kv1.5:24.8_0: Ariyassa sīlassa ananubodhā appaṭivedhā, ariyassa samādhissa, ariyāya paññāya, ariyāya vimuttiyā ananubodhā appaṭivedhā.
kv1.5:24.9_0: Tayidaṁ, bhikkhave, ariyaṁ sīlaṁ anubuddhaṁ paṭividdhaṁ, ariyo samādhi anubuddho paṭividdho, ariyā paññā anubuddhā paṭividdhā, ariyā vimutti anubuddhā paṭividdhā, ucchinnā bhavataṇhā, khīṇā bhavanetti, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti.
